Lots of bugs, bot killers are a bit annoying and ruin the leveling system, some useless perks, matchmaking is slow at times, region selecting is lame because Killers are host in this game and will lag and make the game basically un playable.  There's a lot of problems with this game but it is still a LOT of fun to play.  There isn't much for skins in my opinion and there will hopefully be more choices to change looks of your character in the future.  Overall great game, should still be considered ALPHA in my opinion as well. I hope they can fix these changes for the better and not implement the wrong changes to ruin the game.  A lot of discussions about changes to the game, (respawning or infinite hooks for example) would most likely ruin the game and render more perks basically useless unless they make a good number of other major changes to the gameplay and dynamics.  10/10 in my book because it's fun and is kind of neat to see the glitches, until they happen so often you don't want to even think about this game.
